headline: Palantir Deepens HD Hyundai Ties And EMEA Sovereign AI Role
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) has expanded its partnership with HD Hyundai, rolling out its Artificial Intelligence Platform and Foundry across shipbuilding, construction equipment, robotics, and marine services. The company has also been tapped by Sovereign AI, alongside Accenture, to support next generation sovereign AI data centers across EMEA. These moves increase Palantir's involvement in group wide industrial digital transformation and in secure, localized AI infrastructure for...
